farewell: Thank you for using the Loan Calculator, see you next time!
loanAmount: How much would you like to loan? (in CAD)
annualPercentRate: What is the Annual Percentage Rate (APR)?
loanDurInMonths: What is the loan duration in months? (enter a number from 1-360)
invalidInput: Hmmm... that is not valid input.
continueCalculating: Would you like to perform another loan calculation? (Yes/No)
